short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to quickly view AFL information such as matches, fixtures, and the ladder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AFL Quick View is a must-have Chrome extension for every AFL fan, providing a quick and convenient way to stay updated with the latest AFL games and standings. With just a click, you can access live scores, match details, and the current AFL ladder directly from your browserâ€”no need to open new tabs or navigate away from what you're doing.

Key Features:
Instant Game Updates: Quickly see the current round of AFL games, complete with team logos, match times, and live scores. Perfect for staying on top of the action without missing a beat.

Comprehensive Ladder View: Switch easily between viewing live games and the current league standings. Stay informed about team positions, points, and performance stats in real-time.

Customizable Themes: Choose between light and dark modes to match your browsing style or system settings, making the extension easy on the eyes.

Whether you're a die-hard fan or just want to keep an eye on the season, AFL Quick View is your go-to tool for everything AFL. Install it now to keep all the AFL information you need just a click away!
